column5: Luxury home with 6 bedrooms (theater serves as an optional bedroom with king bed/couch conversion), 4.5 bathrooms. Comes equipped with 700 square foot Crossfit Box with Smith machine, pool table game room overlooking lake and pool. Quiet, gated community with ample privacy. Rental to include full access to 2015 Mercedes Sprinter Van that seats up to 15 with driver upon request (driver requires additional fee).  3night minimum stay.
